head.title: Metro Briefing | New Jersey: Trenton: Moratorium On Windmills

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New Jersey: Trenton: Moratorium On Windmills

body.head.byline: By Josh Benson (NYT); Compiled by Thomas J. Lueck

block.p: Acting Gov. Richard J. Codey ordered a moratorium yesterday on the planning and construction of energy-generating windmills off the Jersey Shore. The moratorium will be in effect for 15 months, pending the results of a study of the potential costs and benefits of investing in wind power.

Acting Gov. Richard J. Codey ordered a moratorium yesterday on the planning and construction of energy-generating windmills off the Jersey Shore. The moratorium will be in effect for 15 months, pending the results of a study of the potential costs and benefits of investing in wind power.
